statement.p: In the figure below, the angles that appear to be right angles are in fact right angles. Lengths in the figure are given in units of yards.

Image DescriptionA closed shape with five straight sides, with its interior shaded, where four of its five sides are either horizontal or vertical. Beginning at the bottom right corner and moving straight up, the path around the shape starts with a side that is labeled 104 yards, then moving to the left, a side is labeled 44 yards, then moving diagonally down and left, a side is labeled 37 yards, then moving straight down, a side is labeled 92 yards, and finally moving to the right, a side is unlabeled, connecting back to the original starting point at bottom right.
What is the area of the shaded shape? Give your answer as a decimal number, and then choose the correct units from the dropdown menu.
